attributes.action: humbly suggest to Her Majesty the Queen that the town of Wootton Basset be accorded the 'Royal' prefix.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Wootton Basset has become the focal point of the Nation's grief for our fallen Heroes when they return home.

The good people of this small town represent us all with their prayers and tears, and should receive the recognition of their Queen on behalf of the Nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
